lead_paragraph: The victim’s father said Alfonso Mendez failed to provide CPR and told the victim’s mother that he did not know how.
snippet: The victim’s father said Alfonso Mendez failed to provide CPR and told the victim’s mother that he did not know how.

headline.main: Officer’s Actions Questioned After Asthmatic Girl Dies
headline.seo: Officer Suspended After Encounter With Asthmatic Girl
headline.print_headline: Officer’s Actions Questioned After Asthmatic Girl Dies
